testcase.classname: US07: I would like to have a page where I, as a visitor, can access and select Loan Plans
testcase.name: TC01: The visitor should be able to access the 'Loan Plans' page by clicking on Plans from the Home menu title
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click on the Plans link in the menu header................................passed * When going to the Plans link, it is verified that the Loan Plans page is accessed.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US07: I would like to have a page where I, as a visitor, can access and select Loan Plans
testcase.name: TC02: The visitor should be able to see the 'Loan Plans' link under the Important Link heading
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Go to the end of the homepage.............................................passed * Click on the Loan Plans link under the Important Link heading and confirm that you are on the Loan Plans page.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US07: I would like to have a page where I, as a visitor, can access and select Loan Plans
testcase.name: TC03: Loan Plan Cards should be displayed under the Basic Loan heading on the Loan Plans Page,
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click on the Plans link in the menu header................................passed * Select Basic Loan and see Loan Plan Cards under the Basic Loan heading....passed * Click on the Apply Now button under one of the plans and verify that it works.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US07: I would like to have a page where I, as a visitor, can access and select Loan Plans
testcase.name: TC04: When you click on the Home \ Loan Plans links on the Loan Plans Page, you can go to the relevant pages.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click on the Plans link in the menu header................................passed * On the Loan Plans page, click on the Home link from the Home - Loan Plans options and go to the Home page.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US14: As a registered user, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC01: The user should be able to view and edit their profile information from the user dashboard page
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click the Login button and go to the user login page......................passed * The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password".passed * Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US14: As a registered user, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC02: The user should be able to see and edit card information on the Profile Settings page.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click the Login button and go to the user login page......................passed * The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password".passed * Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited.passed * User name, e-mail address, phone number, country information should be visible.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US14: As a registered user, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC03: Information in the Profile Card section should be editable in Profile Settings.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click the Login button and go to the user login page......................passed * The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password".passed * Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited.passed * Firstname and lastname are edited.........................................passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US14: As a registered user, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC04: The user should be able to select and upload new files from the image section of the profile settings.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click the Login button and go to the user login page......................passed * The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password".passed * Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited.passed * Click on Choose File button in Image section..............................passed * The new file is selected and uploaded.....................................passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US14: As a registered user, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC05: In the Zip Code section in the profile settings section, characters other than digits should not be entered.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click the Login button and go to the user login page......................passed * The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password".passed * Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited.passed * Non-digit characters are entered in the zip code section..................passed * Enter digit characters in the Zip code section and save the changes by clicking the submit button.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US14: As a registered user, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC06: The user can make the necessary changes in the profile settings section and save these changes.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the site with the given "Url"..........................passed * Click the Login button and go to the user login page......................passed * The user logs in to the user dashboard page with "userNameSuphi" and "password".passed * Click on the Profile link to go to the page where profile information can be edited.passed * The user makes the necessary changes in the profile settings section and saves the changes by clicking submit.passed * Profile updated successfully appears when the changes are saved...........passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US34: As an administrator, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC01: After logging in to the admin dashboard, the admin icon should appear in the upper right corner.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US34: As an administrator, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC02: When clicking on the admin icon, profile, password, logout links should appear.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page.passed * The visibility of Admin, Profile, Password, Logout links is verified......passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US34: As an administrator, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC03: Clicking on the profile link should take you to the Profile Information page and
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page.passed * Click on the profile link.................................................passed * Name, email, image information is updated and saved.......................passed * It is confirmed that the changes made have been saved successfully by the text Profile updated successfully in the upper right corner.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US34: As an administrator, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC04: Clicking on the password link should take you to the password setting page and
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page.passed * Click on the password link and go to the password setting page............passed * In the Change password section, used Password, New Password and Confirm Password information must be entered.passed * It is confirmed that the changes made have been saved successfully by the text Password changed successfully in the upper right corner.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US34: As an administrator, I want to be able to access and update my profile information.
testcase.name: TC05: When the Logout link is clicked, you must successfully leave the page.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page.passed * Click on the profile link.................................................passed * Click on the admin icon in the upper right corner of the admin dashboard page.passed * Click on the logout link..................................................passed * It is verified that the admin page is exited..............................passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US45: As an administrator, I want to be able to edit the profile information of a user I choose.
testcase.name: TC01: The 'Active Users' link should appear and be active under the 'Manage Users' link
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the Manage Users link............................................passed * Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US45: As an administrator, I want to be able to edit the profile information of a user I choose.
testcase.name: TC02: When the 'Active Users' link is clicked, the 'Active Users List' and list titles should be displayed.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the Manage Users link............................................passed * Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page.passed * User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US45: As an administrator, I want to be able to edit the profile information of a user I choose.
testcase.name: TC03: To access information about any user selected from the list, the 'Details' button must be visible and active.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the Manage Users link............................................passed * Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page.passed * User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed.passed * Click on the Details link under the Action information of an Active User..passed * Go to User Details page...................................................passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US45: As an administrator, I want to be able to edit the profile information of a user I choose.
testcase.name: TC04: The selected user's current profile information should be directed to the editing screen.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the Manage Users link............................................passed * Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page.passed * User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed.passed * Click on the Details link under the Action information of an Active User..passed * Go to User Details page...................................................passed * The name and surname information under the heading Information of is reorganized and saved.passed * The email address under the Information of heading is rearranged and saved in the correct format (there must be an "@" sign in the email address).passed * City information under the Information of heading is reorganized and saved.passed * The State information under the Information of heading is reorganized and saved.passed * Zip code information under the Information of heading is rearranged and saved.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US45: As an administrator, I want to be able to edit the profile information of a user I choose.
testcase.name: TC05: When the changes are approved, the user profile information in the system must be updated.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the Manage Users link............................................passed * Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page.passed * User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed.passed * Click on the Details link under the Action information of an Active User..passed * Go to User Details page...................................................passed * The information under the Information of heading is rearranged and saved by clicking Submit button.passed * Changes are confirmed by the 'User details updated successfully' notification in the upper right corner of the page.passed * Close the page............................................................passed

testcase.classname: US45: As an administrator, I want to be able to edit the profile information of a user I choose.
testcase.name: TC06: When an unexpected error occurs in the system, a clear error message should be displayed to the user.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the Manage Users link............................................passed * Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page.passed * User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed.passed * Click on the Details link under the Action information of an Active User..passed * Go to User Details page...................................................passed * An attempt is made to enter missing - incorrect address information to the "e_mail" address.passed * Please add an "@" sign to the email address. The "@" is missing in the "e_mail" address.' incorrect input notification is displayed.passed * Close the page............................................................passed
